name: The Gathering at Golden Creek
description: Situated on 23 acres of peaceful property, The Gathering at Golden Creek is a wedding venue located in Bremen, GA. The numerous event spaces throughout this venue make it the perfect place to celebrate.

name: Fendley Farmstead LLC
description: Fendley Farmstead, LLC is a picturesque farm wedding venue located in Canton, GA. Nestled in the scenic countryside of rural Georgia, this estate provides historic settings and expansive pastures for your special day.

name: Cherokee County Conference Center @ The Bluffs
description: Over 8,000 sq ft of conference space, Four configurable conference floor areas, Sutali Room (75 Dining Seats), Warluskee Room (150 Dining Seats), Sequoyah Room (275 Dining Seats), Advanced technology.

name: The Venue at Sharp Mountain, LLC
description: Voted The Knot Best of Weddings, WeddingWire Couples' Choice, and Georgia Business Journal Best of Regional winner. The Venue at Sharp Mountain, LLC is a wedding and events venue located in Jasper, GA.

name: Harrells Vineyard
description: Harrell’s Vineyard is a serene and picturesque wedding venue in Newnan, GA. Nestled on 30 acres just outside of Atlanta, this family-owned vineyard blends history, natural beauty, and Southern charm.

name: The Farm At Rivers Edge
description: Nestled in the heart of Dawsonville, GA, The Farm at River’s Edge is the perfect destination for an unforgettable river wedding. Spanning 32 acres of breathtaking farmland.

name: Sage Cottage
description: Where Cozy Cottage Charm Meets Timeless Elegance. Welcome to Sage Cottage, the premier wedding venue in North Georgia, where your dream wedding becomes a reality. On 13 picturesque, wooded acres.

name: The Willows Farm
description: Located in Marble Hill, GA, The Willows Farm is a country event venue that hosts weddings and other special occasions. This picturesque property is nestled in the rolling hills of Georgia, amid 300 pastures.

name: White Laurel Estate
description: White Laurel Estate is a former equestrian farm now transformed into a beautiful wedding venue with onsite accommodations and fully customizable all-inclusive packages. Situated just outside of Atlanta.

name: The Georgia Club
description: The Georgia Club is a one-of-a-kind wedding venue in Statham, GA. An outdoor wedding garden, an indoor ceremony location, two reception venues with customizable floor plans for up to 300 people.

name: Beautiful Beginnings Farm
description: Hello everyone. We are pleased to introduce ourselves to you. Our names are David and Lisa. We are a happily married couple and the owners of Beautiful Beginnings Farm. The peculiarity of our wedding venue is the unique combination of rustic charm and elegance.

name: The Tate House
description: The Tate House is a historic wedding venue situated in Tate, GA, an hour's drive from downtown Atlanta. First built in 1921, this mansion is constructed with Etowah pink marble, giving it a breathtaking appearance.

name: Spring Lake Events
description: The calm waters of our beautiful lake and the wispy willow trees framed in cattails will take your breath away at Spring Lake. Imagine candles on the lake and wind chimes in the trees as you sit in our serene environment.

name: Magnolia Creek Farms
description: Located in Adairsville, GA, Magnolia Creek Farms is a countryside setting ideal for weddings and special occasions. This venue features 170 acres of tranquil grounds and is nestled in the scenic foothills of the Appalachian Mountains.

name: Downtown Moreland Mill
description: Downtown Moreland Mill is a wedding and events venue located in Moreland, GA. Home to the Moreland Hometown Heritage Museum, this setting is rich with historic, old-world charm. The onsite team knows how to make your event special.

name: Barn South
description: Welcome to Barn South. We think you'll feel at home here. Located north of Atlanta in Talmo, GA, Barn South exemplifies a luxury Southern destination with natural character. Crafted by the vision of our team, this venue offers a unique blend of rustic elegance and modern amenities.

name: Swan Lake Overlook
description: Nestled in the countryside of Dawsonville, GA, Swan Lake Overlook is a modern and elegant wedding venue. The estate sits on over 200 acres of gorgeous natural landscape and is home to many exciting amenities for your special day.

name: Gaithers at Myrtle Creek Farm
description: Located in the rolling hills of Covington, GA, in Southern Newton County sits Gaither's at Myrtle Creek Farm, a historic setting for weddings and other special events. This county-owned venue exudes rustic charm and natural beauty.

name: Autumn Oaks of Winder
description: In the heart of Winder, GA, sits a charming wedding venue, perfect for hosting your celebration. Autumn Oaks of Winder is owned by Charles Howard, who envisioned a space where loved ones could gather to create lasting memories.

name: Thompson House & Gardens, 9 Oaks Farm, & 2425 Warehouse
description: We offer three beautiful venues: The Thompson House and Gardens which is a stunning vintage Victorian home built in 1888 in Bogart, Georgia. The Thompson House and Gardens embraces nature and elegance, providing a perfect backdrop for your wedding day.

name: Hightower Falls
description: Always dreamed of a waterfall wedding? Hightower Falls is a picturesque wedding venue located in Cedartown, Georgia. With a natural 80 ft. waterfall and a historic 1850's gristmill ruins, this venue offers a unique and breathtaking setting for your special day.

name: The Sixty Two
description: The Sixty Two is a unique wedding venue in Atlanta, GA, that sets the stage for the celebration of a lifetime. The venue offers a luxurious space where you and your guests can make magical memories as you celebrate your love.

name: 2400 On The River
description: 2400 On The River is a rustic riverfront wedding venue located near Calhoun, GA. Surrounded by the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains and overlooking the Coosawattee River, this peaceful retreat offers a serene and picturesque setting for your wedding day.

name: The Chapel Athens
description: Situated in Athens, GA, The Chapel Athens is a pristine downtown estate for weddings, engagements, and anniversaries. Your event can be a fairytale dream come true with various indoor and outdoor event spaces available.

name: Juliette Chapel
description: Juliette Chapel & Events in Dahlonega, GA is a wedding venue ideal for intimate affairs. Couples looking to host smaller, private celebrations will be interested in this space. It is also ideal for elopements and vow renewals.

name: 1051 Baxter
description: 1051 Baxter is a brand new events facility in the heart of Athens, GA. The 6000 square foot venue can host weddings and gatherings for up to 300 depending on the event type and requirements. Ceremonies can be held indoors or outdoors.

name: Twin Ponds at Riverbend
description: Twin Ponds at Riverbend is a breathtaking wedding venue in Plainville, GA, setting the stage for couples to create unforgettable memories. This property and its staff provide guests with a relaxed and picturesque environment for their celebration.

name: Bogle Farm, LLC
description: Located in Greenville, GA, Bogle Farm, LLC is an award-winning, idyllic wedding venue. Over 13 years, this venue has provided a micro-resort for guests to enjoy, offering access to nature and a sense of seclusion for your special day.

name: Falling Waters Mountain Lodge
description: Falling Waters Mountain Lodge in Ellijay, GA is a rural retreat and wedding venue. Located only a 12-minute drive from Ellijay’s downtown and 90 minutes from Atlanta, this property is located in a secluded area surrounded by natural beauty.

name: Summit Farm Weddings
description: Up in the serene Blue Ridge Mountains of Ellijay, GA, sits Summit Farm Weddings, an enchanting countryside event venue with a panoramic view of the Appalachian Mountains. The property is owned and operated by a family dedicated to making your wedding day unforgettable.
